phrases: Do you remember the first time we met?
I am the type who believes in things like fate.
So I think it was fate.
You can laugh if you want.
When I was darkness at that time
God, I have only one request
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I want to need your love
You have a new message Unopened messages: 1
After the long wait, spring has arrived!
Now that I think back about it,
it was like I was running away from home.
To Dad and Mom, I am going to Tokyo!
I will be in touch as soon as I find a place, so please send me the boxes in my room.
To Dad and Mom, I am going to Tokyo!
I will be in touch as soon as I find a place, so please send me the boxes in my room.
But apparently, my parents were not really shocked.
To Dad and Mom, I am going to Tokyo!
I will be in touch as soon as I find a place, so please send me the boxes in my room.
I have a sister two years older than me
and a sister two years younger than me.
The family was already loud as it was,
but back then, whether awake or asleep,
how I want to go to Tokyo or want to live in Tokyo.
Perhaps my parents were more relieved that
they would hafta worry about one less noisy daughter.
When I left, I did not feel any loneliness for leaving my family
or sentiment for parting with the city I had lived in for twenty years.
I was just so happy about going to Tokyo.
My heart was filled with hope and expectations.
I will wait for you at the platform.
I will wait for you at the platform.
From now on, under the skies of Tokyo, I will be able to see Shoji every day.
From now on, under the skies of Tokyo, I will be able to see Shoji every day.
I can talk to him a lot, not by phone or email, but face to face.
Thank you for using the Tohoku bullet train today.
- Due to the snow, the train's departure,., - What is this?
- I want to find a seat quickly,
You got flattened by this, did not you?
Er... by the way... is this seat open?
She has an aura different from that of a commoner.
She is skinny and has a small face.
I envy how the loud makeup looks good on her.
Beautiful people look great, no matter what they do.
Wow, a well-worn Vivienne Westwood ring!
It is been running like this for a while now.
What am I going to do?
I am amazed at what high school students can do nowadays.
But I am twenty years old.
Then I guess we are the same age.
She is so cute when she laughs.
No way, you do not look it.
The way you said high school students nowadays
makes you seem a lot older!
I live in the analog world.
Due to the snow, we will be proceeding at low speeds for a while.
- We apologize for the inconvenience - No way!
When will we get to Tokyo?
What is the purpose of your stay in Tokyo?
I will look for a job in Tokyo.
What, you are moving there too?
I thought you were from Tokyo.
So you are not returning home from a tour around the country.
You have a guitar, after all.
I figured you were a professional musician.
So, are you in a band?
Back in my hometown I was.
Or, no, it is the phone.
I have got no idea when we will arrive.
But it could be around midnight.
Then I will call you again when I know what time we are arriving.
So you are chasing after a guy who moved to Tokyo.
Well, I guess you are right about that.
Well, he is not from Tokyo.
We went to the same college at our hometown.
But he came to Tokyo a year ago to study art.
Why did not you go with him then?
I told him that I would go too.
But Shoji... he insisted I should not.
Because I have no objective or money.
He says it is not wise to make such a move without a plan.
So I tearfully stayed back and saved up money to make the move.
We made a promise that if Shoji passed the entrance exams to University,
then I would move to Tokyo!
I am going to find a job and give every effort
so he does not tell me to go home!
What am I doing telling all this to a stranger?
From the look of things, we have got lots of time.
Then, will you hear me out so we can kill time together?
To be honest, I was dying to talk to someone about him.
His name's Shoji, and he is kind, reliable, and pretty cool.
But when he talks, he acts like a fool.
Hey, want to have some beer?
To Shoji passing the University exams!
No, that has nothing to do with me.
Then, can we at least drink to this unique moment?
To two girls, the same age,
arriving in Tokyo at the same time on the same train.
That is quite a coincidence, do not you think?
My name is Nana too, Nana.
Do you remember the first time we met?!
Before we knew it, there was a snowstorm outside.
The train was stop and go all the way,
and it took us five hours to get to Tokyo.
But I was not at all bored.
and did not bother to ask about you at all.
you likely would have just changed the subject or something, anyway.
You are so mean to be laughing!
You really had a tough time.
I became friends with the girl sitting next to me.
But she is not here, even though we got off the train together.
I should have given her my cell number and stuff.
Then you can hardly call yourself friends.
Kyosuke and Junko are waiting downstairs.
Is it all right to be staying over...
- like it is the natural thing to do?
Though the place is a mess since you came on sudden notice.
I am being a bother by suddenly coming like this, are not I?
I was hoping to stay with Jun-chan until I found my own place.
But that would not be too considerate, would it?
Those two are living together now.
It was like, before I knew it,
Kyosuke had moved to Junko's place.
Hey, you have still got your shoes on!
Tokyo is not a foreign country, you know!
Hey, are you taking my clothes off already?
I wonder, can Shoji and I gradually become like that too?
I want to make up for all the time we were apart.
When you go out, leave the key in the mailbox.
When you go out, leave the key in the mailbox.
I wanted to be sure to get up early and make breakfast for him.
I will make up for it before Shoji gets back.
Doing stuff like this makes me feel like a newlywed wife.
Just to imagine how happy I would be to help him out like this every day.
What is with that surprised look?
Because you come across as the type that does not do much cooking.
This was worth the three hours it took me to make it.
By the way, how did it go with the real estate agent?
I did not have time today, so I could not go.
You were looking for a job.
I have got to look for a job.
Do not tell me you were sleeping the whole time.
I cleaned the house, did laundry and stuff.
It was a super productive day!
You did not come all the way to Tokyo to do that, did you?
You promised you would find a job that would allow you to make it on your own,
and give it every effort, right?
How can you say such a thing?
I did this all for you, Shoji!
I should not have talked to him like that.
It is like I am trying to make him feel guilty.
I can take care of myself.
You will not find a nice place for fifty thousand yen a month or less.
If I work hard, I might be able to afford a bit more for the rent,
but cannot I get a better deal on the deposit?
Hmm... if you do not mind living in an older building.
And it is very reasonable for this space!
Do you want to go and see it?
That mansion, built long before I was even born,
had such a high-class feel to it.
I fell in love with the elegant western design the moment I saw it.
The only problem was that the seven-story building had no elevator.
the riverside location and green environment
Would it be all right if I show this person the place too?
Sorry, but that would be a problem.
This customer has pretty well decided on this place.
Am I such a forgettable person?
I did not recognize you at first.
You look different with these clothes and hairdo.
You do not have a fixed style, do you?
- Well, I would not really say we are friends.
If you have not made a decision yet,
can you please allow this young lady to see the place?
- I will take it! - Is that so?
- Wait a minute! - Wait a minute!
You cannot just decide like that!
But you seemed to be having a problem making up your mind.
I am tired of staying at crappy capsule hotels.
I just want to hurry up and live any place that is available.
If any place will do, look elsewhere.
For me, it has to be this place!
What is wrong with you staying at your boyfriend's place?!
But as things are now, it is only a matter of time!
You were all lovey-dovey about him.
That is true, but let me tell you!
what are you going to do about renting this...
For someone in the business of serving customers,
There is more to doing your job than just go through the motions!
Who is this carefree old man?
This is Mr. Ando from the real estate agency at the train station.
He is a 52-year veteran in this business.
You two seem to be special acquaintances.
Why do not the two of you share this place?
This place is designed with the dining room in the middle,
so with a room on opposite sides, you can maintain your privacy.
Yet you will be there for each other when needed.
Plus, you will only be paying half the rent and living expenses.
- Half the rent?! - Half the rent?!
- Half of seventy thousand yen is......thirty-five thousand yen?
- Let us go for it, Nana!
It is like a dream... - I guess that means...
- This place is great and so cheap! - we will hafta split our fees, too.
Sounds good, but are you the kind of person
who properly respects the privacy of others?
If privacy is an issue, you can put locks on your room doors.
I will arrange for that right away.
You are such a nice person.
Miss Osaki, sure it will be cheaper,
but you really should think this through.
Sharing a flat with a stranger is nothing but annoying.
You are a lonely man, are not you, Yokoi?
Say, Mr. Ando, how soon can the locks be arranged?
If I made arrangements right away,
then it will be done sometime tomorrow morning.
I will be moving in tomorrow afternoon.
Then starting tomorrow, we are roommates, Nana-chan.
That moment, for some reason I felt a bit like crying.
I really cannot explain why, but when I shook Nana's hand,
the warmth was so great that it even warmed my heart.
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
My hand had no place to go
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
